Row.Text: New adventures across the sea await! [n][n]The Exploration Age brings many new opportunities: [BLIST] [LI] Explore the great oceans in search of Distant Lands. Your Naval Units can heal in coastal waters. [LI] Establish Settlements on Distant Lands, meet new Civilizations, and gather new Resources to enrich your empire. [LI] Embrace Religion by building a Temple. With a Religion in place, you can train Missionaries to spread your faith across the globe. [/LIST]
You now have the ability to train the {1_MissionaryIcon} [b]{2_MissionaryName}[/b], which can spread [b]{3_ReligionName}[/b]!

A {1_MissionaryIcon} [b]{2_MissionaryName}[/b] has been trained in {3_CityName}! [n]To convert a Settlement with no Religion, you must use the Convert action once anywhere within its borders. [n]If the Settlement already has a Religion, you must Convert both its Urban and Rural populations. Use the Convert action once on an [b]Urban tile [/b]and once on a [b]Rural tile[/b].

You can now construct a [b]Temple [/b]in one of your Settlements, which will allow you to establish a [b]Religion[/b]. To define your Religion, you will need to choose 2 Beliefs: an [b]Enhancer Belief [/b]and a [b]Founder Belief[/b].[BLIST][LI]Additional Beliefs can be found through special Civics or from Narrative Events.[LI]Train a [b]Missionary [/b]Unit to convert other Settlements to your faith.[/LIST]

Your Specialist Cap has increased, allowing you to place more Specialists on Urban tiles. Place Specialists on high adjacency tiles to achieve the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_SCIENCE_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].

The Ocean is navigable but [b]dangerous[/b]. Naval Units travelling by sea will [b]take damage [/b]if they end their turn in deep [b]Ocean [/b]tiles. [n][b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] {LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]will allow your non-Military Units to take this dangerous voyage. [n][b]Mastering [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME} [/b]will ensure the safety of all Units in the water.

The Ocean is navigable but [b]dangerous[/b]. Naval Units travelling by sea will move slowly in deep [b]Ocean [/b]tiles and [b]take damage [/b]if they end their turn there. [n][b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] {LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]will allow your non-Military Units to take this dangerous voyage. [n][b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME} [/b]will remove the dangerous effects of the voyage, and make it quicker. [n][b]Mastering [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME} [/b]will allow all Units to embark on this voyage.
While the {LOC_UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER_NAME} supports Land Units, The {1_fleetCommanderIcon} [b]{2_fleetCommanderName} [/b]organizes and directs [b]Naval Units[/b].

With a [icon:BUILDING_TEMPLE] {LOC_BUILDING_TEMPLE_NAME} complete, the {1_civAdj} people can found a [b]Religion[/b]! [n]Similar to [b]Pantheons[/b], Religions can boost various parts of your Civilization based on the [b]Beliefs[/b] you choose. More Beliefs can be unlocked via the [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Civic Tree. [n]Your [b]Reliquary Belief [/b]will determine how you will earn Relics, which are critical to the {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_SCIENCE_NAME} Legacy Path.
You can now choose an Enhancer Belief! [n][b]Enhancer Beliefs [/b]can make it easier to spread your Religion.

You will now place the Settlements you selected. Choose one of them to place, then choose a tile to place it on. Try to place your Settlements on fresh water (teal highlighted tiles) and near valuable Resources.

Welcome to the {1_AgeName} Age Advanced Start![n][n]You have a variety of options for your starting empire from a list of available Legacies. Once you've made your selections, you can place any Settlements you have, and then begin your journey into the {1_AgeName} Age.[n][n]

Select Legacies based on the number of [b]Legacy Points [/b] you have. Each Legacy has a point cost. [n][n][BLIST][LI] {1_Prompts} a Legacy to add it to your selection. [LI] {1_Prompts} a Legacy in your selection to remove it.[/LIST] [n][n]After you make all of your selections, {2_Prompts} [b]Confirm[/b].

Welcome to the {1_AgeName} Age![n][n]Here you will decide which [b]Legacies [/b] to carry forward. The options available are based on which Milestones you completed in the previous Age. Fully completing a Legacy Path unlocks the [b]Golden Age Legacy [/b]for that Path, while not gaining any Milestones in a Path will unlock its [b]Dark Age Legacy.[/b][n][n]You can only choose one Golden Age or Dark Age Legacy, but any number of other Legacies can be added as long as you have enough Legacy Points of the matching type.

Select Legacies based on the number and type of [b]Legacy Points [/b]you have. Each Legacy has a point cost.[n][n]Wildcard points can be spent on any Legacy. [n][n][BLIST][LI] {1_Prompts} a Legacy to add it to your selection. [LI]{1_Prompts} a Legacy in your selection to remove it.[/LIST] [n][n]After you make all of your selections, {2_Prompts} [b]Confirm[/b].
Your Civilization can now produce Great Person Units. Each Great Person has a unique effect, which can be activated in specific locations.

Civilizations are remembered for their accomplishments and the paths they take through history. Some spread their accomplishments across a wide range, while others are devoted to a single cause.[n]Your Advisors are at your service to guide you on the path of your choice. Like any great leader, you may change your mind at any time.[n]Now, choose where to focus the efforts of the {1_civAdj} people.
(Legacy Paths are currently disabled. If you enable them, your Advisors will be at your service to guide you on the path of your choice.)
The lands beyond the horizon gleam with endless possibility — and prosperity.
Our army is the aegis behind which empire thrives.
The world is bounded by its horizon; the imagination is not.
Progress does not come from individual genius, but from a community of thinkers.
{1_PathDescription}[n]Your [b]{2_LegacyPathAdvisor} [/b]is here to guide you in this path if you wish.[n]Note that you can change paths at any time.
Explore new lands and bring home valuable Treasure!
Sail to new lands and expand your empire's reach!
Found a new faith and create special Relics!

If we are to become an enlightened people, we must grapple with the mysteries of this new age with rigor, passion, and above all, collaboration. Bring our finest minds to the cities, where they may share in their wisdom and expertise.

The [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_SCIENCE_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Legacy of the Exploration Age focuses on improving yields in your Settlements. [n]Objective: Increase the number of Specialists that can be placed in Districts by researching [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] [b]{LOC_TECH_EDUCATION_NAME}[/b], then [b]place {1_Number} Specialists[/b] in Districts outside of city centers.
Our cities are abuzz with conversation, debate, and fellowship, and we are wealthy with knowledge. But there is always room for more.

Specialists improve the adjacency yields of the District they occupy. With enough Specialists, a District can achieve high yields. Next Objective: Achieve a total yield of [b]{1_NumYield} or more [/b]in a non-city center tile, and have [b]{2_NumSpecialists} or more Specialists [/b]on one non-city center tile.
Single non-city-center tile yield {1_NumYield}/{2_TargetYield} {3_Icon} [n]{4_NumSpecialists} Specialists in non-city center tile {5_Icon}
Never have so many great minds shared the same space and breathed the same air. What they create will be an inspiration to countless others.
Next Objective: Achieve a total yield of {1_Amount} or more in a single non-city center tile.
The great enthusiasm for inquiry and creativity in our cities is a delight to behold. Surely it is a welcome contagion, if administered well?
Next Objective: Achieve a yield of {1_Amount} in {2_Amount} or more non-city center tiles.
Achieve a yield of {1_Amount} in {2_YieldCurrent}/{3_YieldGoal} non-city-center tiles.
The city streets of our civilization are alive with the clamor of a thousand dreams. I only wish for a thousand more.
Next Objective: Achieve a yield of {1_Amount} in {2_Amount} or more non-city center tiles.
Achieve a yield of {1_Amount} in {2_YieldCurrent}/{3_YieldGoal} non-city-center tiles.
Everywhere I go in our civilization, I am greeted with an unrivaled fervor for discovery. A beautiful and profound expression of the mind's capacity to imagine.

Congratulations! You've completed all {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_SCIENCE_NAME} Milestones, and completed the [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_SCIENCE_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Legacy Path for the Exploration Age! [n]You can visit the [b]Legacy Path Screen [/b]to see more Legacy Paths you can follow, or you can forge your own path.

New lands await across the ocean, ripe with wealth and power for those who would seize it. Yet threats also lurk in the unknown, preparing for our demise. We must make the first move to safeguard our people's future. It is time to set sail!

The world expands, yet dangers old and new lurk beyond our borders. Our homeland is paramount to our success, and we must protect it at all costs – through a show of strength. Which settlement shall we conquer first?

Objective: Research the [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] [b]{LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]and [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] [b]{LOC_TECH_ASTRONOMY_NAME} [/b]Technologies, the first step towards establishing a [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} [/b][icon:NOTIFICATION_DECLARE_WAR] Military Legacy of the Exploration Age. [n][b]{LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]will allow your Units to traverse dangerous [b]Deep Ocean[/b], and [b]{LOC_TECH_ASTRONOMY_NAME} [/b]will unlock the powerful {1_CommanderIcon} {2_CommanderName}, which can organize your [b]Naval Units[/b]. [n][n]Remember: [icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] [b]Legacies [/b]improve your performance in later Ages, but [b]you can choose to pursue one, multiple, or none at all[/b].

{LOC_CIVILIZATION_MONGOLIA_NAME} offers you a unique way to establish a [icon:NOTIFICATION_DECLARE_WAR] Military Legacy in the Exploration Age. While other Civilization must traverse the [b]Deep Ocean[/b], you will receive points for [b]capturing Settlements in your Homeland[/b]. [n]Objective: Use the {1_CommanderIcon} {2_CommanderName}, the Mongolian Unique Commander, to [b]capture a Settlement[/b]. [n][n]Remember: [icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] [b]Legacies [/b]improve your performance in later Ages, but [b]you can choose to pursue one, multiple, or none at all[/b].

Our navigators are now wise to the ocean's tricks. They await your orders to guide our people to Distant Lands. We must secure a foothold across the seas, a settlement that will be our base of operations.
The settlement has fallen to our forces. A bold battle, and well-fought! Our noyans are fearless and eagerly await your next command. Where will they bring their conquering blades next?

[b]Distant Lands [/b]are any lands inaccessible in Antiquity, typically by [b]Deep Ocean[/b]. It can be dangerous to traverse the oceans, but there are new [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] [b]Resources[/b], space to [b]settle[/b], and [b]people [/b]beyond the horizon. [n]Next Objective: Establish a Settlement in [b]Distant Lands[/b].

As {LOC_CIVILIZATION_MONGOLIA_NAME}, [b]any [/b]Settlement captured scores {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points. If your Homeland is lacking in Settlements, you can follow your [icon:YIELD_GOLD] [b]Economic Advisor's [/b]advice to reach [b]Distant Lands[/b]. [n][b]Distant Lands [/b]are any lands inaccessible in Antiquity, typically by [b]Deep Ocean[/b]. It can be especially dangerous to traverse the oceans. [n]Next Objective: Capture [b]another Settlement[/b].
Create a Settlement in Distant Lands {1_CompletionIcon}
Our new settlement thrives, bustling with excitement and ambition. But a single town will not last long in the storm of history. We should begin expansion immediately.

Now we have seized two settlements, a clear demonstration of our strength and ferocity. The world will think twice about tangling with our people. All fear the {1_civAdj} army – and rightly so. We are coming for them.

[n]Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by settling & capturing in [b]Distant Lands[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]Founded Settlements grant 1 Point. [n]Captured Settlements grant 2 Points.

Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by capturing [b]Settlements[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]If your Homeland is lacking in Settlements, you can follow your [icon:YIELD_GOLD] [b]Economic Advisor's [/b]advice to reach [b]Distant Lands[/b].
Earn {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points by settling & capturing in Distant Lands {1_PointsCurrent}/{2_PointsTarget}
{1_civAdj} settlements grow, and with them the safety and prosperity of the people. Our show of strength empowers them, and other empires listen when they speak. We must continue to safeguard them.

Through the fires of war, our empire grows – and with it the safety and prosperity of the {1_civAdj} people. They are empowered by our show of strength, and strive to change the world beyond the battlefield. We must continue to safeguard these pursuits.

[n]Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by settling & capturing in [b]Distant Lands[/b], the second Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]Founded Settlements grant 1 Point. [n]Captured Settlements grant 2 Points. [n]Settlements converted to your Religion grant 2 Points; consider following your [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] [b]Culture Advisor's[/b] advice to convert Settlements.

Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by capturing [b]Settlements[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]If your Homeland is lacking in Settlements, you can follow your [icon:YIELD_GOLD] [b]Economic Advisor's [/b]advice to reach [b]Distant Lands[/b].
Earn {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points by settling, converting, & capturing in Distant Lands {1_PointsCurrent}/{2_PointsTarget}

The world stands in awe of the great {1_civAdj} empire. None can stop us now! Yet our intelligence suggests there are still lands waiting to be settled – or conquered. We should indulge our ambitions while our success runs hot.

The world bows before the fury of the great {1_civAdj} empire. Our armies are unstoppable! Yet reports suggest there are still lands that yearn to be settled – or conquered. We should not keep them waiting.

[n]Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by settling & capturing in [b]Distant Lands[/b], the third and final Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]Founded Settlements grant 1 Point. [n]Captured Settlements grant 2 Points. [n]Settlements converted to your Religion grant 2 Points; consider following your [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] [b]Culture Advisor's[/b] advice to convert Settlements.

Next Objective: [b]Earn {1_PointsTarget} {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points [/b]by capturing [b]Settlements[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Legacy Path[/b]. [n]If your Homeland is lacking in Settlements, you can follow your [icon:YIELD_GOLD] [b]Economic Advisor's [/b]advice to reach [b]Distant Lands[/b].
Earn {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points by settling, converting, & capturing in Distant Lands {1_PointsCurrent}/{2_PointsTarget}

Our settlements spread across land and sea, and the fires of our people light the horizon from one end of the earth to another. We have built an empire that has changed the course of history. The magnificence of the {1_civAdj} civilization is eternal!

Our settlements spread across the earth, forged by soldiers and civilians alike. We have truly built an empire that has changed the course of history. All bow before the might of the {1_civAdj} civilization!

Congratulations! You've earned 12 {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} Points and completed the [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_MILITARY_NAME} [/b][icon:NOTIFICATION_DECLARE_WAR] Military Legacy Path of the Exploration Age.[n]You can visit the [b]Legacy Path Screen [/b]to see more Legacy Paths you can follow, or you can forge your own path.
The currency of the world is not gold, but fame. Let us collect the beautiful, the prestigious, the sacred, that the {1_CivAdj} name will be synonymous everywhere with the good.

Objective: Study [icon:NOTIFICATION_CULTURE_TREE_REVEALED] [b]{LOC_CIVIC_PIETY_NAME} [/b]Civic, the first step towards establishing a [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Cultural Legacy of the Exploration Age. [n][icon:NOTIFICATION_CULTURE_TREE_REVEALED] [b]{LOC_CIVIC_PIETY_NAME} [/b]will allow you to build a [icon:BUILDING_TEMPLE] [b]{LOC_BUILDING_TEMPLE_NAME} [/b]and [b]establish a Religion[/b]. [n][n]Remember: [icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] [b]Legacies [/b]improve your performance in later Ages, but [b]you can choose to pursue one, multiple, or none at all[/b].
Adherents of our religion proclaim its universal message to our rivals as well as ourselves. Let us put this to the test. Build missionaries and send them to foreign Settlements.

You may now Train a {1_missionaryIcon} [b]{2_missionaryName}[/b], a Unit that can [b]Convert [/b]Settlements to your Religion. For any Settlements following another Religion, you will need to [b]Convert [/b]both a [b]Rural [/b]tile and a [b]Urban [/b]tile; Settlements without Religions only need to be [b]Converted [/b]once. [n]Next Objective: Train a {1_missionaryIcon} [b]{2_missionaryName} [/b]and [b]Convert [/b]a foreign Settlement.
Train: {1_missionaryIcon} {2_missionaryName} {3_itemComplete} [n]Convert a foreign Settlement to your Religion {4_itemComplete}
Our religion is capturing more and more hearts, but so far it lacks refinement. Adopt an Enhancer Belief to help it spread far and wide.

Studying [icon:NOTIFICATION_CULTURE_TREE_REVEALED] [b]{LOC_CIVIC_THEOLOGY_NAME} [/b]will allow you to adopt an [b]Enhancer Belief[/b], a Belief that will make it easier to convert Settlements to your Religion and therefore create Relics. [n]Next Objective: Study [icon:NOTIFICATION_CULTURE_TREE_REVEALED] {LOC_CIVIC_THEOLOGY_NAME} and adopt an Enhancer Belief.
We have shaped how our people dream, what they hope for. Careful with that.

Now that your Religion has an [b]Enhancer Belief[/b], you can easily convert Settlements. Remember, you earn Relics based on the Reliquary Belief you have adopted. [n]Like [b]Codices [/b]of the Antiquity Age, you will need to construct certain Buildings like the [icon:BUILDING_TEMPLE] {LOC_BUILDING_TEMPLE_NAME} and Wonders to [b]Display Relics[/b]. Every Relic that you display progresses you further along the {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} Legacy Path. [n]Next Objective: Collect and Display [b]six Relics[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
The reliquary shines with gold, jewels, and with the collected hopes of the faithful.

You've displayed 6 Relics! You can earn Relics through your [b]Reliquary Belief[/b], but you can also earn them through Narrative Events, becoming Suzerain of a City-State, and more. [n]Next Objective: Collect and Display [b]9 Relics[/b], the second Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
It is whispered that our relics give divine aid to our cause. True or not, it is an impressive collection.

You've displayed 9 Relics! You can earn Relics through your [b]Reliquary Belief[/b], but you can also earn them through Narrative Events, becoming Suzerain of a City-State, and more. [n]Next Objective: Collect and Display [b]12 Relics[/b], the third and final Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
The fame of our relics extends far beyond the glitter of their gold casings. We have gained what all hope for: we will be remembered.

Congratulations! You've displayed 12 [b]Relics [/b]and completed the [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_CULTURE_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Legacy Path of the Exploration Age.[n]You can visit the [b]Legacy Path Screen [/b]to see more Legacy Paths you can follow, or you can forge your own path.
If we are to seek our fortune in Distant Lands, we will need the right knowledge, and the right tools.

Objective: Research the [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] [b]{LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]and [icon:NOTIFICATION_TECH_DISCOVERED] [b]{LOC_TECH_ASTRONOMY_NAME} [/b]Technologies, the first step towards establishing a [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_GOLD] Economic Legacy of the Exploration Age. [n][b]{LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME} [/b]will allow your Units to traverse dangerous [b]Deep Ocean[/b], and [b]{LOC_TECH_ASTRONOMY_NAME} [/b]will unlock the powerful {1_CommanderIcon} {2_CommanderName}, which can organize your [b]Naval Units[/b]. [n][n]Remember: [icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] [b]Legacies [/b]improve your performance in later Ages, but [b]you can choose to pursue one, multiple, or none at all[/b].
Now that we know how to get there, we will claim a piece of the distant shores as our own.

[b]Distant Lands [/b]are any lands inaccessible in Antiquity, typically by [b]Deep Ocean[/b]. It can be dangerous to traverse the oceans, but there are new [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] [b]Resources [/b]and [b]people [/b]beyond the horizon. [n]Next Objective: Establish a Settlement in [b]Distant Lands[/b]. Then, find and improve a [icon:RESOURCE_TYPE_DISTANT_TREASURE] Treasure resource there.
Create a Settlement in Distant Lands {1_CompletionIcon} [n]Improve a [icon:RESOURCE_TYPE_DISTANT_TREASURE] Treasure resource in a Distant Settlement {2_CompletionIcon}
With a newly established base in Distant Lands, the real work can begin. Let's improve Resources before our rivals do, to ensure that we reap the benefits.

[b]Distant Lands [/b]have different [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] [b]Resources [/b]from your Homelands, and after enough time, a [b]Treasure Convoy [/b]can be loaded to take these Resources to your Homelands. [n]Next Objective: Improve five [icon:RESOURCE_TYPE_DISTANT_TREASURE] [b]Treasure Resources[/b] and wait for a [b]Treasure Convoy [/b]to spawn in the Settlement[/b].
We have produced our first bounty, but there is work yet to be done. One does not prepare a delicious meal only to let it go cold on the table.

Now that you have a [b]Treasure Convoy [/b]full of valuable [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] [b]Treasure Resources[/b], you need to grant it safe passage to a [b]Homelands Settlement[/b]. [n]When you unload the treasure, you will receive one {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Point for every [b]Treasure Resource [/b]improved in the Settlement the Treasure Convoy originated from. [n]Next Objective: [b]Score 10 {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} (TF) Points[/b], the first Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
Score TF Points by unloading Treasure Convoys in your Homeland Settlements {1_ScoreCurrent}/{2_ScoreTarget}

I have received news of our Treasure Convoy's arrival. This is cause for celebration, certainly, but it is only the beginning. Now all our empire looks to Distant Lands for its prosperity. Let's not keep them waiting.

You can increase your scoring rate by founding more [b]Settlements in Distant Lands[/b], [b]acquiring more [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Treasure Resources[/b]. [n]Next Objective: [b]Score 20 {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} (TF) Points[/b], the second Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
Score TF Points by unloading Treasure Convoys in your Homelands Settlements {1_ScoreCurrent}/{2_ScoreTarget}
The trade winds have been more than favorable to us, bringing wealth beyond measure from Distant Lands. If we are diligent, no one will dare question the legacy we create.

You can increase your scoring rate by founding more [b]Settlements in Distant Lands[/b], [b]acquiring more [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Treasure Resources[/b]. [n]Next Objective: [b]Score 30 {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} (TF) Points[/b], the third and final Milestone along the [b]{LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Legacy Path[/b].
Score TF Points by unloading Treasure Convoys in your Homelands Settlements {1_ScoreCurrent}/{2_ScoreTarget}
With this last Treasure Convoy, we have ensured not only that our people are prosperous, but that our accomplishments will be remembered for all time. Wealth beyond measure indeed.

Congratulations! You've earned 30 {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} Points, and completed the [b][icon:NOTIFICATION_TEAM_VICTORIOUS] {LOC_LEGACY_PATH_EXPLORATION_ECONOMIC_NAME} [/b][icon:YIELD_GOLD] Economic Legacy Path of the Exploration Age.[n]You can visit the [b]Legacy Path Screen [/b]to see more Legacy Paths you can follow, or you can forge your own path.

As the {1_CivAdj} people have plans for new Buildings, you may not want to create more Urban Quarters. In [b]Exploration [/b]and beyond, you can choose to build atop an existing but outdated Building by [b]Overbuilding[/b].[n]While Overbuilding doesn't have particular benefits now, you may find [b]Social Policies[/b], [b]Civ Abilities[/b], and more that will make Overbuilding especially efficient.
